Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. We are willing to sell the product to you for $950000. This price reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates the product's worth. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
